Quick plots of wind speed and its dynamics

Source: R/quick_plots.R
plot_merra.Rd

The function is in progress, will be included in the package release.

Usage

plot_merra(
  x,
  name = "W50M",
  scale = 1,
  intercept = 0,
  limits = c(0, 35),
  palette = "RdYlBu",
  direction = -1,
  na.value = "#040434",
  legend.position = c(0.91, 0.05),
  legend.name = "",
  timestamp.variable = "UTC",
  timestamp.format = "%Y-%b-%d, %Hh %Z",
  timestamp.position = c(150, 87),
  expand.x = c(0, 0),
  expand.y = c(0, 0),
  map.border = "lightgrey",
  map.border.size = 0.25,
  ...
)

Arguments

x
name
scale
intercept
limits
palette
direction
legend.position
legend.name
timestamp.format
timestamp.position
expand.x
expand.y
...

Examples

NA
#> [1] NA
